name: INBODY
description:
Welcome to Inbody by Little Blood Cell Studios!

Each level is themed after a part of the body: hands, heart and brain. Kill the sicknesses, and solve the puzzles to pass the levels.

Keys A & D to move left and right 

Space bar to jump/next line in a cutscene  

Aim with mouse and click to shoot

Press Q to pick up an object, or start a puzzle

Play in Fullscreen for the best experience
